title: Bloomberg Markets: Nike’s 36-Year Quest for Transparent Sole

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ira Boudway Bloomberg Journalist Bloomberg Editorial Discussing his Bloomberg Businessweek story "Nike’s 36-Year Quest for the Transparent Sole."
